description: This file provides API service functions for interacting with a backend To-Do API, including CRUD operations and error handling logic.

methods.name: buildUrl
methods.description: Constructs a full URL with optional query parameters based on the base URL and path.

methods.name: defaultJsonHeaders
methods.description: Creates default headers for JSON API requests, allowing extra headers to be added.

methods.name: readBodySafely
methods.description: Reads and parses the response body as JSON if possible, otherwise as text, or null.

methods.name: throwForResponse
methods.description: Normalizes and throws an error based on the response, marking network/server errors.

methods.name: requestJson
methods.description: Performs fetch request with error handling, returning parsed JSON data.

methods.name: listTodos
methods.description: Fetches the list of todos from the backend API.

methods.name: createTodo
methods.description: Creates a new todo item with the provided payload.

methods.name: updateTodo
methods.description: Updates an existing todo item identified by id with the provided payload.

methods.name: deleteTodo
methods.description: Deletes a todo item identified by id.
